header.h1: K-12 Online Public School in Arizona!

div.p: Arizona Connections Academy is more than a tuition–free K–12 online public school option available for students throughout Arizona. It's also a tight-knit school community offering all the services and resources needed to create a well-rounded student experience.

Ready to go? Start your online
registration now!

h3.a: Important information about COVID-19 for enrolled families

br.p: Students throughout Arizona are thriving at Arizona Connections Academy (ACA), a tuition-free online public school. ACA gives students the flexibility to learn at home with a curriculum that meets rigorous state education standards.

div.p: Events are great ways to learn more

div.blockquote: I love Arizona Connections Academy because it allows me to work at my own pace any time of day or week in order for me to go to rabbit shows or out to ride horses.
Connections Academy caters to a child's uniqueness. We are so grateful that there is a school that gives our family flexibility while still offering such a great education for our daughters.
I loved ACA because it helped me to learn at my own pace and get answers to my millions of questions, all in a day, by exploring many resources.

I love teaching at ACA because of the flexible schedule. The benefit of teaching at an online school is that I can provide instructional materials on my message board that are available to my students 24/7.

ul.li: Arizona Connections Academy (ACA) is a free online public school serving students in grades K–12 throughout Arizona.
Arizona Connections Academy is accredited by the North Central Association Commission on Accreditation and School Improvement (NCA CASI), an accrediting division of Cognia, formerly AdvancED.
Nearly 94% of ACA parents parents agree that the Connections Academy curriculum is high quality. View our parent survey results.
